description: This Java class defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic endpoints such as a welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for health checks, documentation redirects, welcome message, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message indicating the service is operational.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to the Swagger UI documentation page, preserving scheme/host/port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Provides a lightweight health check endpoint returning 'OK'.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns basic information about the application.
